name: Rusty's Marble Run
description:
Control the tilt of the maze to get the ball to the end. Press Backspace to restart and Escape to exit. Please use a controller because using a mouse can cause the ball to fall through the floor. Made following a GameDev.TV blueprint tutorial series. Enjoy!

Just the one level but comment below if you'd be interested in playing this as a full game with more complicated mazes with obstacles or if you have any ideas for how to improve it. Thanks!
